ygData.subject: Re: warrior upgrade in new patch
ygData.msgSnippet: If you guys want a good 2h weapon try the Blackend Iron Bastard Sword (DAM 20 Delay 47).  It spawns on a lvl 24 goblin knight in runnyeye. I still cant believe
ygData.messageBody:
If you guys want a good 2h weapon try the Blackend Iron Bastard Sword (DAM
20 Delay 47). It spawns on a lvl 24 goblin knight in runnyeye. I still cant
believe how much theses sell for considering how easy the mob is to kill.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Swift <tswift@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 2:16 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch


>From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
>
>It does, thanks. I am a dark elf warrior, and it isn't likely I am going
to
>get a faction to make me amiable with those dwarves tho :)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 2:10 PM
>Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch
>
>
>From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
>I asked this question long ago. But have since found the answers to the
>quest. I will not gi ve the secret away, but I will give the start
location
>and a hint. The start is in Kalidim warriors guild and has to do with the
>cleaner. You have to have good faction with the dawarven warriors there.
>(You must be a warrior to do the quest as well from what I know.) Your
>faction must be at least amiable I think also. The quest is very long and
>takes traveling all over the world to complete. Hope that gives you the
>info you need to start the quest.
>
>Dyvim Kincaid 32
>Cazic Thule
>Daks 20
>Quellious (or however you spell it *grin)
>
>

>> Hit points i believe are at 649. Hope this helps.. I will try to
remember
